backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested GGPA calculator features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files involved in the GGPA calculator implementation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the GGPA calculator page.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/components/Re: Card that shows calculate button, validation errors, or computed CGPA result with performance message.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/components/Se: Displays a semester with subjects, SGPA status, validation messages, and controls for editing or removing the semester.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/components/Su: Row UI for entering a subjectâ€™s credits and grade with a remove button.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/ggpaMath.ts: Utility functions for converting grades to points and calculating SGPA/GGPA with validation and formatting.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/icons.tsx: SVG React components for semester and subject icons.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/types.ts: Type definitions for Grade, Subject, Semester, and grade options.
frontend/src/features/ggpa/useGgpaCalcul: Zustand store for managing semesters, subjects, and GGPA/SGPA calculations with add/update/remove logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the calculator.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/GgpaCalculatorPage.ts: UI page rendering the GGPA calculator with semester cards, add-semester button, results, and styled layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, and existing features for a responsive vanilla JS GGPA calculator. Lists architecture notes, versioning, and all implemented functional and visual features.
